mapper.select:
select sum(sum_device - online_device_ED)/sum(sum_device) 复合关机率 from (select in_motion.dt,sum_device,online_device_ED from ( select dt,count(b.DDI_No) as sum_device from (select date(CreateDate) dt from t_shop_order_info where date(CreateDate) >= '2019-08-13' group by dt ) t left join (select DDI_No,SHOP_No,DSI_Anti,DSI_Try,ifnull(DSI_Withdraw,now()) DSI_Withdraw from study.t_device_sub_info ) b on t.dt between date(DSI_Try) and date(DSI_Withdraw) left join t_device_device_info a on a.DDI_No = b.DDI_No left join netfiance_db.t_shop_shop_info e on b.SHOP_No = e.SHOP_No LEFT JOIN netfiance_db.t_shop_agent_list f ON e.SHOP_AGUid = f.AGNT_Uid LEFT JOIN netfiance_db.t_shop_agent_top g ON f.AGNT_ATUid = g.ATOP_Uid left join study.t_shop_sub_info d on e.SHOP_No = d.SHOP_No left join (select DICT_Value,DICT_Name from netfiance_db.t_sys_dictionary_info where DICT_Field = 'shop_class' ) l on l.DICT_Value = e.SHOP_Class where DSI_Anti is null #and a.DDI_Type = '{{设备类型}}' #and g.ATOP_Title = '{{ 渠道名称 }}' #and l.DICT_Name = '{{ 网点类型 }}' #and d.SHOP_Area = '{{ 所属地区 }}' group by dt ) in_motion
left join
(select date(a.CreateDate) dt,count(a.DOL_DUid) online_device_ED from t_device_online_list a left join t_device_device_info b on a.DOL_DUid = b.DDI_Uid left join study.t_device_sub_info c on b.DDI_No = c.DDI_No left join netfiance_db.t_shop_shop_info d on d.SHOP_No = c.SHOP_No left join netfiance_db.t_shop_agent_list e on d.SHOP_AGUid = e.AGNT_Uid left join netfiance_db.t_shop_agent_top f on e.AGNT_ATUid = f.ATOP_Uid left join study.t_shop_sub_info h on d.SHOP_No = h.SHOP_No left join (select DICT_Value,DICT_Name from netfiance_db.t_sys_dictionary_info where DICT_Field = 'shop_class' ) t on t.DICT_Value = d.SHOP_Class
where a.CreateDate >= c.DSI_Try and (a.CreateDate <= c.DSI_Withdraw or c.DSI_Withdraw is null) and DOL_Length <> 0 and c.DSI_Anti is null #and f.ATOP_Title = {{选择渠道}} #and b.DDI_Type = {{选择设备类型}} #and h.SHOP_Area = '{{ 所属地区 }}' #and t.DICT_Name = '{{ 网点类型 }}' group by dt ) online_device on online_device.dt = in_motion.dt
#where in_motion.dt >= '{{起始时间}}' and in_motion.dt <= '{{截止时间}}' #选择某个时间段（设备开机记录是从8月10日开始，之前无数据）
) detail

select sum(online_device_ED-sell_device)/sum(online_device_ED) 0销售占比率 from ( select sheet2.dt,sell_device,online_device_ED from
( select date(a.CreateDate) dt,count(distinct(ODER_DUid)) sell_device from t_shop_order_info a left join t_device_device_info b on a.ODER_DUid = b.DDI_Uid left join netfiance_db.t_shop_shop_info d on a.ODER_SPUid = d.SHOP_Uid left join study.t_device_sub_info c on c.DDI_No = b.DDI_No and c.SHOP_No = d.SHOP_No left join netfiance_db.t_shop_agent_list e on d.SHOP_AGUid = e.AGNT_Uid left join netfiance_db.t_shop_agent_top f on e.AGNT_ATUid = f.ATOP_Uid left join study.t_shop_sub_info h on d.SHOP_No = h.SHOP_No left join (select DICT_Value,DICT_Name from netfiance_db.t_sys_dictionary_info where DICT_Field = 'shop_class' ) t on t.DICT_Value = d.SHOP_Class where ODER_State = 0 and c.DSI_Anti is null and a.CreateDate >= c.DSI_Try and (a.CreateDate <= c.DSI_Withdraw or c.DSI_Withdraw is null) #and f.ATOP_Title = {{选择渠道}} #and b.DDI_Type = {{选择设备类型}} #and h.SHOP_Area = '{{ 所属地区 }}' #and t.DICT_Name = '{{ 网点类型 }}' group by dt) sheet1
right join
( select date(a.CreateDate) dt,count(a.DOL_DUid) online_device_ED from t_device_online_list a left join t_device_device_info b on a.DOL_DUid = b.DDI_Uid left join study.t_device_sub_info c on b.DDI_No = c.DDI_No left join netfiance_db.t_shop_shop_info d on d.SHOP_No = c.SHOP_No left join netfiance_db.t_shop_agent_list e on d.SHOP_AGUid = e.AGNT_Uid left join netfiance_db.t_shop_agent_top f on e.AGNT_ATUid = f.ATOP_Uid left join study.t_shop_sub_info g on d.SHOP_No = g.SHOP_No left join (select DICT_Value,DICT_Name from netfiance_db.t_sys_dictionary_info where DICT_Field = 'shop_class' ) t on t.DICT_Value = d.SHOP_Class
where a.CreateDate >= c.DSI_Try and (a.CreateDate <= c.DSI_Withdraw or c.DSI_Withdraw is null) and date(a.CreateDate) >= '2019-08-14' and DOL_Length <> 0 and c.DSI_Anti is null #and date(a.CreateDate)>='{{起始时间}}' and date(a.CreateDate) <='{{截止时间}}' #and f.ATOP_Title = {{选择渠道}} #and b.DDI_Type = {{选择设备类型}} #and g.SHOP_Area = '{{ 所属地区 }}' #and t.DICT_Name = '{{ 网点类型 }}' group by dt ) sheet2
on sheet1.dt = sheet2.dt ) sheet

select sum_empty_time/sum_online_time 空仓时长占比 from
( select 'sheet',sum(last_hour) sum_online_time from( select c.DDI_No,c.SHOP_No,date(c.DSI_Try) 启用时间,m.DSL_Note,date(a.CreateDate) dt,round(sum(a.DOL_Length)/60,1) last_hour from t_device_online_list a left join t_device_device_info b on a.DOL_DUid = b.DDI_Uid left join t_device_sub_list m on b.DDI_Uid = m.DSL_DUid left join study.t_device_sub_info c on b.DDI_No = c.DDI_No left join netfiance_db.t_shop_shop_info d on d.SHOP_No = c.SHOP_No left join netfiance_db.t_shop_agent_list e on d.SHOP_AGUid = e.AGNT_Uid left join netfiance_db.t_shop_agent_top f on e.AGNT_ATUid = f.ATOP_Uid left join study.t_shop_sub_info g on d.SHOP_No = g.SHOP_No left join (select DICT_Value,DICT_Name from netfiance_db.t_sys_dictionary_info where DICT_Field = 'shop_class' ) t on t.DICT_Value = d.SHOP_Class
where DOL_Length <> 0 and c.DSI_Anti is null and a.CreateDate >= c.DSI_Try and (a.CreateDate <= c.DSI_Withdraw or c.DSI_Withdraw is null) and a.CreateDate >=#{startDate} and a.CreateDate <=#{endDate} #and b.DDI_Type = {{选择设备类型}} #and f.ATOP_Title = {{选择渠道}} #and g.SHOP_Area = '{{ 所属地区 }}' #and t.DICT_Name = '{{ 网点类型 }}' group by b.DDI_No,SHOP_No,启用时间,m.DSL_Note,dt ) t )sheet1
left join
(select 'sheet',sum(empty_time) sum_empty_time from(
select DDI_No,SHOP_No,DSL_Note,空仓时间,ifnull(补票时间,#{endDate}) 补票时间,timestampdiff(minute,空仓时间,ifnull(补票时间,#{endDate}))/60 empty_time from ( select d.DDI_No,d.SHOP_No,b.DSL_Note,b.DSL_No,a.CreateDate 空仓时间,(select n.updated_at from t_storage_checkout_packages_detail m join t_storage_checkout_packages n on m.package_no = n.package_no where warehouse_id = a.DSLG_DSUid and n.updated_at > a.`CreateDate` order by n.updated_at asc limit 1) 补票时间,d.DSI_Withdraw from t_device_sub_change_log a left join t_device_sub_list b on a.DSLG_DSUid = b.DSL_Uid left join t_device_device_info c on b.DSL_DUid = c.DDI_Uid left join study.t_device_sub_info d on c.DDI_No = d.DDI_No left join netfiance_db.t_shop_shop_info h on h.SHOP_No = d.SHOP_No left join netfiance_db.t_shop_agent_list e on h.SHOP_AGUid = e.AGNT_Uid left join netfiance_db.t_shop_agent_top f on e.AGNT_ATUid = f.ATOP_Uid left join study.t_shop_sub_info g on h.SHOP_No = g.SHOP_No left join (select DICT_Value,DICT_Name from netfiance_db.t_sys_dictionary_info where DICT_Field = 'shop_class' ) t on t.DICT_Value = h.SHOP_Class where DSLG_NewCount = 0 and dslg_mnuid = '8bf30bce2e914a8fa591635612e20641' and d.DSI_Anti is null and a.CreateDate >= d.DSI_Try and (a.CreateDate <= d.DSI_Withdraw or d.DSI_Withdraw is null) and a.CreateDate >= #{startDate} and a.CreateDate <= #{endDate} #and f.ATOP_Title = {{选择渠道}} #and c.DDI_Type = {{选择设备类型}} #and g.SHOP_Area = '{{ 所属地区 }}' #and t.DICT_Name = '{{ 网点类型 }}' ) t where 补票时间 < DSI_Withdraw )o )sheet2
on sheet1.sheet = sheet2.sheet

select count(SHOP_Title) from ( select d.SHOP_Title,c.DDI_No,b.DSL_Note,b.DSL_No,a.CreateDate 空仓时间 from t_device_sub_change_log a left join t_device_sub_list b on a.DSLG_DSUid = b.DSL_Uid left join t_device_device_info c on b.DSL_DUid = c.DDI_Uid left join t_shop_shop_info d on c.DDI_SPUid = d.SHOP_Uid left join netfiance_db.t_shop_shop_info e on e.SHOP_Uid = d.SHOP_Uid left join netfiance_db.t_shop_agent_list f on e.SHOP_AGUid = f.AGNT_Uid left join netfiance_db.t_shop_agent_top g on f.AGNT_ATUid = g.ATOP_Uid where DSLG_NewCount = 0 and dslg_mnuid = '8bf30bce2e914a8fa591635612e20641' ) o

select avg(日均销售额) 在网设备日均销售额,avg(开机日均销售额) 开机在网设备日均单台销额 from ( select sheet1.DDI_No 设备编号,sheet1.SHOP_No 网点编号,sheet1.启用时间,DDI_Type 设备类型,tol_money 销售总额,搜索时段内天数,sum_turn_on 搜索时段内开机天数,日均销售额,tol_money/sum_turn_on 开机日均销售额 from
(select *,tol_money/搜索时段内天数 日均销售额 from ( select first_sub.DDI_No,first_sub.SHOP_No,first_sub.dt 启用时间,DDI_Type,ifnull(sum(ODER_Money),0) tol_money, case when first_sub.dt>=#{startDate} and first_sub.draw_dt>=#{endDate} then datediff(#{endDate},first_sub.dt)+1 when first_sub.dt>=#{startDate} and first_sub.draw_dt <#{endDate} then datediff(first_sub.draw_dt,first_sub.dt)+1 when first_sub.draw_dt <#{startDate} then 0 when first_sub.dt <#{startDate} and first_sub.draw_dt >= #{startDate} and first_sub.draw_dt < #{endDate} then datediff(first_sub.draw_dt,#{startDate})+1 when first_sub.dt <#{startDate} and first_sub.draw_dt >=#{endDate} then datediff(#{endDate},#{startDate})+1 when first_sub.dt>#{endDate} then 0 end as 搜索时段内天数 #需判断查询起始时间、截止时间，与设备开启时间、撤机时间之间的关系 from (select a.DDI_No,a.SHOP_No,date(a.DSI_Try) dt,ifnull(date(a.DSI_Withdraw),now()) draw_dt,b.DDI_Type from study.t_device_sub_info a left join t_device_device_info b on a.DDI_No = b.DDI_No left join netfiance_db.t_shop_shop_info d on d.SHOP_No = a.SHOP_No left join netfiance_db.t_shop_agent_list e on d.SHOP_AGUid = e.AGNT_Uid left join netfiance_db.t_shop_agent_top f on e.AGNT_ATUid = f.ATOP_Uid left join study.t_shop_sub_info g on a.SHOP_No = g.SHOP_No left join (select DICT_Value,DICT_Name from netfiance_db.t_sys_dictionary_info where DICT_Field = 'shop_class' ) t on t.DICT_Value = d.SHOP_Class where a.DSI_Anti is null #and b.DDI_Type = '{{设备类型}}' #and f.ATOP_Title = {{选择渠道}} #and a.DDI_No = '{{设备编码}}' #and g.SHOP_Area = '{{ 所属地区 }}' #and t.DICT_Name = '{{ 网点类型 }}' order by dt) first_sub #每台机器在网点真实开启时间
left join
(select a.DDI_No,a.SHOP_No,date(a.DSI_Try) dt,e.ODER_Uid,e.ODER_Money from t_shop_order_info e left join t_device_device_info b on e.ODER_DUid = b.DDI_Uid left join study.t_device_sub_info a on b.DDI_No = a.DDI_No where date(e.CreateDate)>=#{startDate} and date(e.CreateDate) <=#{endDate} and e.ODER_State = 0 and a.DSI_Anti is null and e.CreateDate >= a.DSI_Try and (e.CreateDate <= a.DSI_Withdraw or a.DSI_Withdraw is null) ) order_detail on first_sub.DDI_No = order_detail.DDI_No and first_sub.SHOP_No = order_detail.SHOP_No and first_sub.dt = order_detail.dt
where first_sub.dt <=#{endDate} group by DDI_No,SHOP_No,启用时间 )t order by 日均销售额 desc ) sheet1
left join
(select DDI_No,SHOP_No,启用时间,count(DDI_No) sum_turn_on #一台机器在搜索时间段内开机几天 from (select c.DDI_No,c.SHOP_No,date(c.DSI_Try) 启用时间,date(a.CreateDate) dt,round(sum(a.DOL_Length)/60,1) last_hour from t_device_online_list a left join t_device_device_info b on a.DOL_DUid = b.DDI_Uid left join study.t_device_sub_info c on b.DDI_No = c.DDI_No where DOL_Length <> 0 and date(DATE_ADD(a.CreateDate,interval 1 minute)) <= #{endDate} and date(DATE_ADD(a.CreateDate,interval 1 minute)) >= #{startDate} and c.DSI_Anti is null and a.CreateDate >= c.DSI_Try and (a.CreateDate <= c.DSI_Withdraw or c.DSI_Withdraw is null) group by DDI_No,SHOP_No,启用时间,dt) t where last_hour <> 0 group by DDI_No,SHOP_No,启用时间 )sheet2 on sheet1.DDI_No = sheet2.DDI_No and sheet1.SHOP_No = sheet2.SHOP_No and sheet1.启用时间 = sheet2.启用时间 )tol_sheet

select sum(last_hour) sum_last_hour from( select SHOP_Title,DDI_No,dt,last_hour from (select c.SHOP_Title,b.DDI_No,date(a.CreateDate) dt,round(sum(a.DOL_Length)/60,1) last_hour from t_device_online_list a left join t_device_device_info b on a.DOL_DUid = b.DDI_Uid left join t_shop_shop_info c on b.DDI_SPUid = c.SHOP_Uid left join netfiance_db.t_shop_shop_info e on e.SHOP_Uid = c.SHOP_Uid left join netfiance_db.t_shop_agent_list f on e.SHOP_AGUid = f.AGNT_Uid left join netfiance_db.t_shop_agent_top g on f.AGNT_ATUid = g.ATOP_Uid where DOL_Length <> 0 and c.SHOP_State = 1 group by SHOP_Title,b.DDI_No,dt) t where last_hour <> 0 )o

select sheet1.SHOP_Uid id,sheet1.SHOP_Title name,ATOP_Title channel,sheet1.意向时间 yixiangTime,ifnull(sheet2.关联时间,'') guanlianTime,ifnull(sheet4.dt,'') openTime from (select distinct(SHOP_Uid) SHOP_Uid,SHOP_Title,i.ATOP_Title,date(a.CreateDate) 意向时间,'意向网点' from netfiance_db.t_shop_shop_info a left join netfiance_db.t_shop_agent_list h on a.SHOP_AGUid = h.AGNT_Uid left join netfiance_db.t_shop_agent_top i on h.AGNT_ATUid = i.ATOP_Uid
where date(a.CreateDate) <= '2019-09-15' group by SHOP_Uid) sheet1
left join
(select distinct(SHOP_Uid) SHOP_Uid,date(a.CreateDate) 关联时间,'关联网点' from t_device_sub_list a left join t_device_device_info b on a.DSL_DUid = b.DDI_Uid left join t_shop_shop_info c on c.SHOP_Uid = b.DDI_SPUid where b.DDI_SPUid in (select SHOP_Uid from t_shop_shop_info where SHOP_State = 1) and SHOP_Title <> '公司总部' and date(a.CreateDate) <= '2019-09-15') sheet2
on sheet1.SHOP_Uid = sheet2.SHOP_Uid
left join
(select distinct(SHOP_Uid) SHOP_Uid,dt,'已装票开启' from ( select d.SHOP_Uid,date(min(a.created_at )) dt from t_storage_checkout_packages_detail a join t_storage_checkout_packages b on a.package_no = b.package_no left join t_device_device_info c on b.device_no = c.DDI_No join t_shop_shop_info d on c.DDI_SPUid = d.SHOP_Uid where c.DDI_SPUid in (select SHOP_Uid from t_shop_shop_info where SHOP_State = 1) group by SHOP_Uid order by dt )turn_on where turn_on.dt <= '2019-09-15' ) sheet4
on sheet1.SHOP_Uid = sheet4.SHOP_Uid
order by 关联网点 desc,已装票开启 desc
limit #{pageWrapper.start},#{pageWrapper.pageSize};

select count(*) from (select distinct(SHOP_Uid) SHOP_Uid,SHOP_Title,i.ATOP_Title,date(a.CreateDate) 意向时间,'意向网点' from netfiance_db.t_shop_shop_info a left join netfiance_db.t_shop_agent_list h on a.SHOP_AGUid = h.AGNT_Uid left join netfiance_db.t_shop_agent_top i on h.AGNT_ATUid = i.ATOP_Uid
where date(a.CreateDate) <= '2019-09-15' group by SHOP_Uid) sheet1
left join
(select distinct(SHOP_Uid) SHOP_Uid,date(a.CreateDate) 关联时间,'关联网点' from t_device_sub_list a left join t_device_device_info b on a.DSL_DUid = b.DDI_Uid left join t_shop_shop_info c on c.SHOP_Uid = b.DDI_SPUid where b.DDI_SPUid in (select SHOP_Uid from t_shop_shop_info where SHOP_State = 1) and SHOP_Title <> '公司总部' and date(a.CreateDate) <= '2019-09-15') sheet2
on sheet1.SHOP_Uid = sheet2.SHOP_Uid
left join
(select distinct(SHOP_Uid) SHOP_Uid,dt,'已装票开启' from ( select d.SHOP_Uid,date(min(a.created_at )) dt from t_storage_checkout_packages_detail a join t_storage_checkout_packages b on a.package_no = b.package_no left join t_device_device_info c on b.device_no = c.DDI_No join t_shop_shop_info d on c.DDI_SPUid = d.SHOP_Uid where c.DDI_SPUid in (select SHOP_Uid from t_shop_shop_info where SHOP_State = 1) group by SHOP_Uid order by dt )turn_on where turn_on.dt <= '2019-09-15' ) sheet4
on sheet1.SHOP_Uid = sheet4.SHOP_Uid
order by 关联网点 desc,已装票开启 desc ;
